StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [UpdateProgram_AssignByNwaId]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @ProgramAvailabilityID int, @NWA_ID int, @DutyPreference1 varchar(10), @DutyPreference2 varchar(10), @DutyPreference3 varchar(10), @LastEditBy varchar(50) ) AS
UPDATE PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY SET NWA_ID = @NWA_ID, PROGRAM_ASSIGNMENT_DATE = GETDATE(), USER_LOGIN = @LastEditBy, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY_ID = @ProgramAvailabilityID
IF (@DutyPreference1 IS NOT NULL OR @DutyPreference2 IS NOT NULL OR @DutyPreference3 IS NOT NULL) BEGIN UPDATE NWA SET DUTY_PREFERENCE1 = @DutyPreference1, DUTY_PREFERENCE2 = @DutyPreference2, DUTY_PREFERENCE3 = @DutyPreference3, USER_LOGIN = @LastEditBy, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE NWA_ID = @NWA_ID END
